text:
Hello,

is there any indication that the React based UI cards are going to be available for the side bar? We love the additional functionality the React based cards provide and would like to use them on the sidebar and not just the center tabs.

Thanks!

Hey Kellen, we've been doing a gradual rollout of sidebar support over the past week and a half and it should be at 100% by the end of this week.

If you give me your portal ID I can give you access to it right now though :slightly_smiling_face: .

Hello <@UNHBK8QNM> . Fantastic! Thank you for the quick response and hook up!

Production: 22173732
Sandbox: 43839784
Done. It should start to become available in a few minutes. You can change the `location` property in your card config json to `crm.record.sidebar`
:partying_face: Thank you! You just made my week!
I know this is an old question so hopefully you figured it out but the header is case sensitive so should be `hash === req.headers['X-HubSpot-Signature-Version']`
